somefact: Afghanistan is known for its mountainous terrain.
Albania is home to many ancient castles and archaeological sites.
Algeria is the largest country in Africa by land area.
Argentina is famous for the dance style known as the tango.
Australia is the smallest continent and the largest island in the world.
Bangladesh has the largest river delta in the world, the Sundarbans.
Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, the largest tropical rainforest in the world.
Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world.
China is the most populous country in the world.
Egypt is home to the Great Pyramid of Giza, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.
France is the most visited country in the world.
Germany is known for its automotive industry, including brands like BMW, Mercedes-Benz, and Volkswagen.
India is the world's largest democracy.
Tokyo is the most populous metropolitan area in the world.
Mexico City is built on the ruins of the ancient Aztec capital Tenochtitlán.
Nigeria is the most populous country in Africa.
Russia is the largest country in the world by land area.
South Africa has three capital cities, each serving a different purpose.
The UK is made up of four countries: England, Scotland, Wales, and Northern Ireland.
The US has the world's largest economy.
